oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial view of downtown Nashville, Tennessee, 1954
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An aerial view of downtown Nashville, Tennessee circa 1954, mostly along 5th Avenue N in the foreground, with a partial view of First Presbyterian Church, L & C Garage, and Church of Christ Girls Home. Other landmarks of the central business district include Ross Hotel, Beasley & Sons Company, and others. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Downtown Presbyterian Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Ross Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.); Central Church of Christ Girls’ Home (Nashville, Tenn.); Beasley and Sons Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
